pages.text: The $(item)Concentrator$() is a simple matter manipulating apparatus.$(br) It uses two reagents, from which $(t:In the center of the block)one$() will be influenced by the $(t:Below the influenced item)other$().$(br)If the process is successful, the influenced item will be transformed.$(br)One might want to watch the process, as it will always go on if not unsuccessful.
